messages: a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:07): sighs
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:08): At lunch today, group of friends concluded that I was the girl of the group. The only girl (biologically speaking, that is) agreed.
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (22:09): Biologicality is overrated
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:10): Also, I'm apparently a lesbian.
47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (22:28): a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554: heheh
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:29): Maybe I really should take up b07211a0c7cb119232799d2119cea90f's suggestion of wearing a corset, kilt, and heels to the ball‚Ä¶
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:30): There again, I did tell my date to the ball of his suggestion, and she said she'd desert me! :'(
b07211a0c7cb119232799d2119cea90f (22:31): being a lesbian isn't so bad
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:33): Knowing how pissed off I am at guys in general at the moment I guess I could pass as a lesbian‚Ä¶
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:38): ping 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:43): e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024: here
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:43): I came here to cry about test 48
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:44): and the definition of "visited"
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:45): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: did you have a specific part of CSS spec in mind that this test tests?
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:51): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: acid3 test 48, obviously
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:51): looks
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (22:51): Because 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e has never written any other test suite with 48 tests in it :P
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:52): e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024: i think the test just checks the definition at http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-selectors/#link

e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:54): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: yep. but with arrival of ubiquitous iframes-at-load (ads, tracking, etc.) the definition of "visited" seems to have been somewhat tainted
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:54): in other words, _I_ haven't visited those frames. They visited me
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:55): so both FF and WebKit had to come up with a separate class of history items, visited links
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:56): the items that are technically in your history, just not shown to you as a user
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:56): because you haven't really visited them
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:57): I've been wrangling with this dichotomy and can't come up with a good answer
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:57): other than doing the same for chromium.
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:57): but it just seems kinda wrong
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (22:57): somehow
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): sorry, had a phone call
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): reads up
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): yeah, i see the issue
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): i would just do what they do, to be honest
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): the problem is that sometimes there are sites that do show ocntent in iframes
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): and you want those to handle :link :visited too

a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (22:58): "Using your favorite web browser (Firefox by default), visit wp-admin/install.php within the directory into which you just installed WordPress on your web site."
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): even though the user never sees the url bar
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:58): consider e.g. a forum
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:59): where each forum page is its own iframed page
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:59): you'd want the links to become :visited
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:59): even though you'd never want to offer them in the autocomplete, and probably never directly in the history
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:59): (though you might offer the frame state in the history if you are some kind of god)
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (23:00): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: but this sucks
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (23:00): Web sucks
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (23:00): known bug
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (23:00): evolved platforms tend to suck
57551cb51d38c51417f5abfeacfb9b13 (23:00): e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024: in soviet russia, frames visit you!
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (23:00): they also tend to be successful :-)
e9fe2a8ed6a64844a5c024b6f688d024 (23:01): 57551cb51d38c51417f5abfeacfb9b13: ain't that the truth
